string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City Investigation: Alex
Come to think of it, there is a person you know in #b#m103000000##k. Go ask #b#p1052000##k in #m100000000# if he knows anything about a thief.
#p1052000# says that he will answer anything for you if you give him some news about #m100000000#. News about #m100000000#, what could you tell him about? Talk to #p1052000#.
#p1052000# doesn't seem to know anything about the thief. However, #p1052000# did tell you about the person you should question next.
Hey, Evan, how are ya? Long time no see. What are you doing here? Have you run away from home, too? Or are you on an adventure?\r\n#b#L0#(You tell him about becoming a Guard.)#l\n#k
Wow, a Guard? That's pretty cool. You used to be so clumsy, so I'm kind of shocked. But what brings you to #m103000000#?\r\n#b#L0#(You tell him about #p1061005#'s stolen herb.)#l\n#k
So you're looking for the herb thief in #m103000000#? Well, can I help? Actually, if you can give me some news about #b#m100000000##k, I'll tell you about someone who might know what's going on.
News about #m100000000#... What should I ask you about first. It's been so long. Give me a second. Let me think.
You don't want to? And I was going to help you since you are an old friend.

What should I ask first? Yeah okay, this is good. Is there anyone that has left #m100000000#? Tell me, which of these people are no longer in Henesys?
#b#L0#Casey#l
#L1#Morrow#l
#L2#Denma the Owner#l
#L3#Chief Stan#l
#k

Oh really... Mr. Morrow? I guess he got tired. How about that one girl? What was her name? The girl who never came out of her house because she was so sick. The blond.
#b#L0#Pia#l
#L1#Rina#l
#L2#Maya#l
#L3#Vicious#l
#k

How about #p1012109#? Is he always still reading? His eyes are probably bad by now. Does #p1012109# wear glasses now? What type of clothes does he wear? He's always had a horrible sense of fashion.
#b#L0#Dinosaur-shaped clothes#l
#L1#Apron with frills on the front#l
#L2#Doctor's gown#l
#L3#Glasses and a green robe#l
#k

So he's still nerdy. Oh and...what about the #m100000000# festival? I heard about the preparation for the festival but I never heard if it actually happened. Who was the person in charge of it again?
#b#L0#Mrs. Ming Ming#l
#L1#Ms. Tan#l
#L2#Bruce#l
#L3#Big Headward#l
#k

So it still hasn't happened, huh? I guess she is still a perfectionist. How big does she want this festival to be? Hmm... What else should I ask you...\r\n#b#L0#Aren't you going to ask about Chief Stan?#l\n#k
What? Why should I ask about him? I'm not interested. Hmmpf. But um, does he still use the same cane? \r\n#b#L0#Yeah.#l\n#k
Sheesh, that miser. I told him so many times to get a new cane... Not that I really care or anything! Haha. Hehe... Um, so yeah... You were looking for a thief in #m103000000# right?
Try talking to #b#p1052002##k down there. He know about all the back alley transactions. If the herb or whatever was being traded, he would know.
Casey, the Mini Game Master, left town? That's strange... I actually know someone who went to Henesys to play Mini Games. Are you mistaken?
Denma the Owner's plastic surgery skills are famous even in Kerning City. Are you sure you haven't gotten him mixed up with someone else?
There's no way HE would have left Henesys... Are you trying to test me?
No, no. Not Pia. Pia is the strange kid who always wears a stuffed animal costume. Not him, but the really sick one... What was her name?
Yeah, Rina is blond, but not her. The girl who is closer to our age.
Vicous is a guy...! I'm talking about a girl!
No way, Jay isn't walking around dressed up just like Pia now, right?! Please tell me it's not true!
Jay's taste has gotten that bad?
What? Are you saying that Jay's a doctor now or something? No way. Do you know how scared Jay is of blood. He faints at the sight of a needle.
Isn't Ms. Tan the Dermatologist? If she held the festival, it would be a Brazilian Samba Festival rather than a Henesys Festival. Theirs is no way they would have allowed that!

If Bruce was in charge of a Festival, it would become an Orange Mushroom Festival. What does that guy like Mushrooms so much? He says the reason he lives in Henesys is because the house roofs look like mushrooms.
Big Headward? Who's that? Whoever he is, I can only imagine the size of his head...
